name: Ubiquite
description:
I present you my submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2, which is also my second game ever

I was rather ambitious, wanting to offer a complete experience

I strongly recommand to play the downloadable version, some bugs can appear on the browser one


Context :

You are the last human on Earth, and the little protégé of the Icolanem lab

So, you'll be able to go through 10 rooms of puzzles that make you discover the technology of this lab, including a tool that allows you to create clones of yourself

You are guided by the voice of Tibo, a robot that follows the instructions of the direction...

Controls :

WASD - Move

E - Interact

Tab or 123 - Change clone

Credit :

Tibo voice made with ttsfree.com

Musics made with MuseNet from OpenAI

Everything else has been made by me (even the SFX, they are horrible by the way)
